help-file.title: ARTIFACTS
help-file.content:
Artifacts are ultimately powerful items on Duris. The artifacts grant the wielder/wearer awesome powers. Currently there are twenty-five separate artifacts, each one-of-a-kind. They are unique and only one of each can be found in the game, EVER. This is only a list of the current artifacts, not including uniques or iouns.
Avernus the life stealer --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): Drains the life force of the victim and transfers it to the wielder. Wraps the wielder in a shell of stone. Surrounds its wearer in a shimmering globe of protection. Surrounds its wielder in a holy shield of force. Increases the attack speed of the wielder. Protects the wielder from the elements.
Doombringer the sword of chaos --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): Brings down three elemental powers upon the foes of the wielder. Empowers the wielder with the energy of the elements, allowing them to score numerous extra hits on their opponent. Protects the wielder from the elements. Increases the attack speed of the wielder.
the mace of the
earth --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): Randomly brings the powers of the elemental plane of earth down upon the foes of the wielder. Enhances the senses of the wielder. Conceals the wielder from mundane eyes. Surrounds its wearer in a shimmering globe of protection. Increases the attack speed of the wielder.
the sphere of wind --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): Increases the attack speed of the wielder. Protects the wielder from the elements. Surrounds its wielder in a holy shield of force. Grants the wielder the power of flight. When called, causes a great burst of wind to knock its wielder's foes off their feet.
the sword of fire and flame --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): Randomly brings the powers of the elemental plane of fire down upon the foes of the wielder. Surrounds the wielder in a protective globe of fire. Increases the attack speed of the wielder. Protects the wielder from the elements.
the orb of the sea --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): Grants the wielder increased intelligence and constitution. Allows the wielder to breath water. Increases the attack speed of the wielder. Protects the wielder from the elements. Banishes the wielder's foes back to The Elemental Plane Of Water.
the holy avenger of Ambran --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): Smites foes of evil alignment down with its holy power. Wards off physical and magical attacks from the wielder. Surrounds its wielder in a holy shield of force. Increases the attack speed of the wielder. Enhances the senses of the wielder.
the holy mace of the effreeti --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s) Calls down the holy wraith of the effreeti god Kossuth upon its wielders' foes. Protects its wielder from magical attacks. Surrounds its wielder in a holy shield of force. Surrounds the wielder in a protective globe of fire. Protects the wielder from the elements. Increases the attack speed of the wielder.
staff of blue flames --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): Allows its master to call upon the powers of several arcane spells at will, with but a word. Surrounds its wearer in a shimmering globe of protection. Conceals the wielder from mundane eyes.
the unholy avenger named 'Bloodlust' --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): A vampiric, bloodthirsty blade of great evil that extends its life-draining powers to its wielder. Increases the attack speed of the wielder.
a blood red word named 'Death Rider' --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): Protects its wielder from physical and magical attacks. Smites foes of good alignment down with its unholy power. Enhances the senses of the wielder. Increases the attack speed of the wearer. Surrounds its wielder in a holy shield of force.
Tiamat's poison tail stinger --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Power(s): Enhances a rogues' backstab ability. Grants the wielder the ability to move silently. Protects its wielder from paralysis and the elements. Lashes out with paralysis and poison attacks. Increases the attack speed of the wielder.
the sword of light and
darkness --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Powers: Rumored to call the wrath of all the gods down upon a victim in the form of ice and pain. Wraps the wielder in a shell of stone. Increases the attack speed of the wielder. Enhances the senses of the wielder.
The globe of shadows --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Powers: Allows the necromancer to wither his/her enemies. Increases the attack speed of the holder. Protects the holder from the elements. Grants the holder the ability to move silently. Enhances the senses of the holder. Conceals the holder from mundane eyes.
the mystical warhammer of the barbarian kings OR the mystical warhammer of the ogre chiefs --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Powers: Surrounds its wielder in a protective globe of fire. Surrounds its wielder in a holy shield of force. Wraps the wielder in a shell of stone. Allows the wielder to breathe water. Surrounds its wearer in a shimmering globe of protection. Smites the wielder's foes with lightning.
the granite dagger 'BloodFeast
' --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Powers: Surrounds its wielder in a holy shield of force. Wraps the wielder in a shell of stone. Drains the life force of the victim and transfers it to the wielder. Enhances the senses of the wielder. Increases the attack speed of the wearer.
Sunblade the two-handed sword of justice --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Powers: Surrounds its wielder in a holy shield of force. Wraps the wielder in a shell of stone. Surrounds its wearer in a shimmering globe of protection. Protects its wielder against many of the elements, as well as good and evil. Increases the attack speed of the wearer. Smites the wielders' enemies with the power of the sun.
Tsunami, the trident of storms --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Powers: Increases the attack speed of the wielder. Allows the wielder to breathe water. Surrounds its wielder in a holy shield of force. Grants the wielder increased wisdom and constitution. Vitalizes the wielder's entire group.
the platemail of the Dragonlord --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Powers: Surrounds its wearer in a holy shield of force. Wraps the wearer in a shell of stone. Surrounds its wearer in a shimmering globe of protection. Surrounds its wearer with magic-absorbing spheres.
the Totem of
Mastery --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Powers: Protects its holder against the elements. Enhances the senses of the holder. Grants the holder increased wisdom. Increases the attack speed of the holder.
a pair of pale, misty gloves --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Known Special Powers: Wraps the wearer in a shell of stone. Grants the wearer the ability to move silently. Allows the wearer to blend in with his/her surrounding with a word.
a cloak of Elvenkind --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Grants the wearer the ability to move silently. Protects the wearer from the elements. Deflects spells targeted at the wearer, protecting them from harm.
Ten
dri
ls of
Shadowy Mist --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Enhances the senses of the wearer. Surrounds its wearer in a shimmering globe of protection. Grants the wearer greater agility and dexterity. Increases the attack speed of the wearer.
'Symmetry', the uniform sword of light --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Surrounds its wielder in a shimmering globe of protection. Increases the attack speed of the wielder. Wraps the wielder in a shell of stone. Calls upon the power of the light upon its wielder's foes, and protects its wielder in various ways.
'Mayhem
', chaotic
sword of the night --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Surrounds its wielder in a shimmering globe of protection. Increases the attack speed of the wielder. Wraps the wielder in a shell of stone. Calls upon the chaotic power of darkness upon its wielder's foes, and protects its wielder in various ways.
To see a list of artifacts and their owners, type "artifact".
